channel.title: Wow private server - how do i make one
channel.description: hey, i would like to know how to make my own wow private server so i can do everything not ask gm's for things and they say no lol like a neterdrake/ flying mount leet armour mounts gold big lvl you know the deal juts i cant find anything to do with making your own any one know

item.title: Wow private server - how do i make one
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

h4xx0rz:

hehe my server was a big success ;D i used server source something lol…the links broken now, but i made a very successful servers(s) (ramyscape and corruptscape) lol google “server source builder” it should come up w/ something. or you could do it the old school way! learning java ewwwww java. lol jk i know java but im lazy

We aren’t talking about Runescape private servers… I hope you know that…

Read full topic
